code: import{useState}from"react";const AddressSuggestions=initialValue=>{const[value,setValue]=useState(initialValue);const[suggestions,setSuggestions]=useState([]);const[latitude,setLatitude]=useState("");const[longitude,setLongitude]=useState("");const handleChange=async event=>{setValue(event.target.value);const endpoint=`https://api.mapbox.com/geocoding/v5/mapbox.places/${event.target.value}.json?access_token=${process.env.REACT_APP_MAPBOX_TOKEN}`;const response=await fetch(endpoint);const results=await response.json();setSuggestions(results===null||results===void 0?void 0:results.features);};return{onChange:handleChange,value,setValue,suggestions,setSuggestions,latitude,setLatitude,longitude,setLongitude};};export default AddressSuggestions;
